name: Side Bar Tweak
overview: Adds the ability to shrink the sidebar on desktop, allows for better usage of the sidebar with accessible items.

name: Audio Streamer
overview: A plugin for Mediah that allows users to stream audio files instantly.

name: File Data Import & Export
overview: Import and export files as JSON, to send and store locally for personal reasons, to allow hidden file sharing

name: Bulk Rename
overview: Quickly update multiple file names at once
